DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability Levomilnacipran ER versus placebo treatment outpatient major depressive disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Levomilnacipran ER ( F2695 SR ) Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Men woman , 1880 year old Currently meet DSMIVTR criterion Major Depressive Disorder The patient 's current depressive episode must least 4 week duration Women pregnant , woman breastfeed study , woman childbearing potential practicing reliable method birth control Patients history meeting DSMIVTR criterion : manic hypomanic episode schizophrenia psychotic disorder obsessivecompulsive disorder Patients consider suicide risk
